name: BalloonGame
description:
The level design and balloon physics studies.

The main goal is to reach a yellow platform near the lighthouse. Avoid water!

Controls

Use Arrow Up/Arrow Down to increase/decrease the altitude and  WASD for an alignment maneuver.  Correcting by WASD leads to an  altitude loss!  F1 will restart the game. Escape is for a quiting.

Alternative controls: Space - to float upwards, V - to come down
